state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, attempt to move east. Okay, and then, go south. And then, move west. Then, make an effort to go to the north. If you can do that, take a trip north. Once you accomplish that, attempt to go to the east. After that, take a trip east. With that accomplished, make an attempt to go south. If you can get through with that, try to move west. Okay, and then, go south. Then, move west. That done, go south. With that done, head south. Once you do that, make an effort to head south. Next, pick-up the coin from the floor of the study. That's it! -= Bedroom =- You make a grand eccentric entrance into a bedroom. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
